headline: Simon: Your One-Stop Shop for the Holidays
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, invites shoppers to "Meet Me @themall™" this holiday season to find great deals on gifts, experience the joy of family-friendly activities and make memories across generations in a festive atmosphere at Simon centers nationwide.
